entity.query: INSERT INTO CP_DETAILS WITH (TABLOCKX) (COMPANY_MASTER_SID, ITEM_MASTER_SID) SELECT COMPANY_MASTER_SID, ITEM_MASTER_SID FROM COMPANY_MASTER CM CROSS JOIN ITEM_MASTER IM WHERE CM.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' AND IM.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' and ITEM_MASTER_SID = ? AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CP_DETAILS CD WHERE CD.COMPANY_MASTER_SID = CM.COMPANY_MASTER_SID AND CD.ITEM_MASTER_SID = IM.ITEM_MASTER_SID)

;with CTE as( select IPQ.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_NAME, CASE WHEN IPQ.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_NAME='URA' THEN round(ITEM_PRICE,4) WHEN IPQ.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_NAME='CPIURA' THEN round(ITEM_PRICE,3) WHEN IPQ.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_NAME='CPI (Alt) URA' THEN round(ITEM_PRICE,3) ELSE round(ITEM_PRICE,6) END as ITEM_PRICE, IP.PRICING_CODE_STATUS, IP.ITEM_UOM, IP.START_DATE, IP.END_DATE, IP.ENTITY_CODE, IP."SOURCE", usr1.firstName + ' ' + usr1.middleName + ' ' + usr1.lastName as MODIFIED_BY , IP.MODIFIED_DATE, usr.firstName + ' ' + usr.middleName + ' ' + usr.lastName as CREATED_BY , IP.CREATED_DATE, HT_PRICING_STATUS.DESCRIPTION as prcingstatusdesc, HT_UOM.DESCRIPTION as itemUomdesc, IP.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID, IP.ITEM_PRICING_SID from ##ITEM_PRICING_TEMP_TABLE IP join dbo.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER IPQ on IPQ.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID = IP.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID left JOIN HELPER_TABLE HT_PRICING_STATUS on IP.PRICING_CODE_STATUS = HT_PRICING_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID left JOIn HELPER_TABLE HT_UOM on IP.ITEM_UOM = HT_UOM.HELPER_TABLE_SID LEFT JOIN ?.dbo.User_ usr ON usr.UserId = IP.CREATED_BY LEFT JOIN ?.dbo.User_ usr1 ON usr1.UserId = IP.MODIFIED_BY Where IP.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' )select * from CTE where ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_NAME is not null ? ORDER BY ? OFFSET ? ROWS FETCH NEXT ? ROWS ONLY;

;with CTE as( select IPQ.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_NAME, CASE WHEN IPQ.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_NAME='URA' THEN round(ITEM_PRICE,4) WHEN IPQ.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_NAME='CPIURA' THEN round(ITEM_PRICE,3) WHEN IPQ.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_NAME='CPI (Alt) URA' THEN round(ITEM_PRICE,3) ELSE round(ITEM_PRICE,6) END as ITEM_PRICE, IP.PRICING_CODE_STATUS, IP.ITEM_UOM, IP.START_DATE, IP.END_DATE, IP.ENTITY_CODE, IP."SOURCE", usr1.firstName + ' ' + usr1.middleName + ' ' + usr1.lastName as MODIFIED_BY , IP.MODIFIED_DATE, usr.firstName + ' ' + usr.middleName + ' ' + usr.lastName as CREATED_BY , IP.CREATED_DATE, HT_PRICING_STATUS.DESCRIPTION as prcingstatusdesc, HT_UOM.DESCRIPTION as itemUomdesc, IP.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID, IP.ITEM_PRICING_SID from ##ITEM_PRICING_TEMP_TABLE IP join dbo.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER IPQ on IPQ.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID = IP.ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID left JOIN HELPER_TABLE HT_PRICING_STATUS on IP.PRICING_CODE_STATUS = HT_PRICING_STATUS.HELPER_TABLE_SID left JOIn HELPER_TABLE HT_UOM on IP.ITEM_UOM = HT_UOM.HELPER_TABLE_SID LEFT JOIN ?.dbo.User_ usr ON usr.UserId = IP.CREATED_BY LEFT JOIN ?.dbo.User_ usr1 ON usr1.UserId = IP.MODIFIED_BY Where IP.INBOUND_STATUS <> 'D' ) select Count(1) from CTE where ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_NAME is not null ?
UPDATE IP SET columnName = ? FROM ##ITEM_PRICING_TEMP_TABLE IP where IP.ITEM_PRICING_SID = ?

INSERT INTO ##ITEM_PRICING_TEMP_TABLE( ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID, ITEM_UOM, ITEM_PRICE, PRICING_CODE_STATUS, ENTITY_CODE, START_DATE, END_DATE, INBOUND_STATUS, RECORD_LOCK_STATUS, BATCH_ID, "SOURCE", CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_DATE, ITEM_PRICE_PRECISION ) VALUES( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 'A', 0, '', 'GTN', ?, ?, ?, ?, NULL );

INSERT INTO ITEM_PRICING( ITEM_MASTER_SID, ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID, ITEM_UOM, ITEM_PRICE, PRICING_CODE_STATUS, ENTITY_CODE, START_DATE, END_DATE, INBOUND_STATUS, RECORD_LOCK_STATUS, BATCH_ID, "SOURCE", CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_DATE, ITEM_PRICE_PRECISION) SELECT ?, ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID, ITEM_UOM, ITEM_PRICE, PRICING_CODE_STATUS, ENTITY_CODE, START_DATE, END_DATE, INBOUND_STATUS, RECORD_LOCK_STATUS, BATCH_ID, "SOURCE", CREATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_BY, MODIFIED_DATE, ITEM_PRICE_PRECISION FROM ##ITEM_PRICING_TEMP_TABLE
select count(1) from ##ITEM_PRICING_TEMP_TABLE where COLUMNNAME = 0 OR COLUMNNAME = NULL
select count(1) from ##ITEM_PRICING_TEMP_TABLE where ITEM_PRICING_QUALIFIER_SID = ? and ITEM_UOM = ? and PRICING_CODE_STATUS =? and START_DATE = ?
